@DaMileHighKing The best way to store wine is at a consistently cool temperature away from direct sunlight and agitation. We'd recommend storing it in a basement, back of a closet, or in a temperature-controlled wine fridge. Hope this helps!

Each of the 1,966 bottles in this series comes with a unique, customized QR code that, when scanned, brings the user to the transaction record for the corresponding NFT purchase ‚Äî an unfakeable and immutable proof of authenticity that will forever live on the blockchain.

Both the NFT and wine collector communities thrive on authenticity, traceability and ownership, so this unique pairing offers exciting possibilities and foreshadows the future of collectorship, where blockchain technology sets the standard for provenance.
How is Robert Mondavi Winery reimagining the world of wine collecting with NFTs?
